attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel it is time to punish those who are in the early stages
of committing crimes. Including anti social behaviour. Looking
at how people are not put off by cautions and ASBO's. It would
be far better to introduce a Boot Camp system and when
completed this would not give the offender a criminal record
just a mark to allow the police to know he/she had attended a
camp. Depending on the severity it could be a two to four week
camp. And it must be completed within 4 weeks of committing the
offence. The system is far to slow to punish offenders and
because of this they re offend prior to attending court.
We want to see the introduction of Bootcamps as an alternative to the failing ASBOs
